title: John Rodgers Terminal
context: ยง261-24 John Rodgers Terminal. When a new transpacific terminal building is constructed, it shall be designated &ldquo;John Rodgers Terminal&rdquo; in memory of the late Commander John Rodgers, United States Navy, who made the first flight in a Navy flying boat to these islands in September, 1925. [L 1947, c 31, ยง2; RL 1955, ยง15-28; HRS ยง261-24]
